title: Flipper Dunk 3D
description: Flipper Dunk 3D is a challenging single-tap pinball-basketball game. You'll need the patience of a monk and the precision of a master to dunk. See if you have what it takes to be a master dunker. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, but it will be highly satisfying when you finally dunk that ball! Check outTap Tap Shotsfor a similar game.
